Paragraph: Taking advantage of the temperature - dependent aggregation effect , BHJ PSCs with PffBB-n:PC71BM as an active blend layer spin - coated at different temperatures were fabricated and investigated which showed considerably various photovoltaic performance.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BHJ PSCs (Bulk Heterojunction Polymer Solar Cells) |
| PffBB-n:PC71BM (a specific active blend layer) |

Note: "temperature-dependent aggregation effect" and "photovoltaic performance" are properties of the materials or systems mentioned in the paragraph. "Different temperatures" is a property value since it refers to specific temperature values used in the experiment.
